title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8ยง 8.3 - Passing mark or state designated performance level
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8ยง 8.3 - Passing mark or state designated performance level

State Regulations
(a) Except as prescribed in section
100.5
of this Title, the minimum
passing score in Regents examinations shall be 65 or such other minimum passing
score as approved by the Board of Regents. (b) The State designated performance level or
cut score for determining proficiency on all State student assessments in the
elementary and secondary grades, other than Regents examinations, shall be
established by the commissioner subject to approval by the Board of

Regents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8ยง
8.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
